lead_paragraph: Four Israelis were indicted Tuesday over the beating of an Eritrean migrant they mistook for an attacker during a shooting last fall.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Israel: Charges in Migrant’s Beating

snippet: Four Israelis were indicted Tuesday over the beating of an Eritrean migrant they mistook for an attacker during a shooting last fall.
abstract: Four Israelis are indicted on charges of attacking Eritrea migrant Habtom Zerhom, who they mistook for Arab assailant who fatally shot soldier in October 2015.
